game.name: Chicken Jump, Puppy Jump
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: An online multiplayer party game for 4–8 players. Build your crew of robo-animal thieves, roam across insane locations to snatch treasures, or simply STEAL goodies from rival players — all to become the MOST WANTED crew on the Bounty Board!
game.shortDescriptionEn: An online multiplayer party game for 4–8 players. Build your crew of robo-animal thieves, roam across insane locations to snatch treasures, or simply STEAL goodies from rival players — all to become the MOST WANTED crew on the Bounty Board!
